landingPage.title: Hi, I am Joel
landingPage.subtitle: A product owner that excels at bridging customers and development teams

aboutMe.text:
I'm a product owner extraordinaire, bridging the gap between customers and dev teams. I've got a solid grasp on both business and tech, making me a versatile asset.
Understanding customer needs is my superpower. I transform ideas into innovative product solutions that rock. And hey, I know how to keep things fun while getting the job done!
If you're looking for a dynamic product owner who brings expertise and a dash of humor to the table, let's connect. Together, we'll create something amazing!

Cheers.
